Author: rms
Content: I emailed transburgh a while ago and said I would like to try GoBig's service for free and write about it on news.yc. His response was that they didn't think it was a good idea because whether or not I raised money had little to do with them and everything to do with my company.

Author: thinkingserious
Title: A Guide to Gaining Value from Social Media Traffic
Content: Here are 12 tips. What value have you received from social media traffic?
